input_device_index.description: Microphone device index to use for audio input. Set to null for system default.

sample_rate.description: Audio sample rate in Hz (common values: 16000, 44100, 48000)

noise_floor_multiplier.description: Multiplier applied to noise floor when determining silence threshold (0.1-2.0)

noise_monitor_window_seconds.description: Duration in seconds for noise floor monitoring window

output_device_index.description: Speaker device index to use for audio output. Set to null for system default.

silence_window_seconds.description: Duration in seconds to monitor for silence before stopping recording

history_exchanges.description: Number of recent user-assistant exchanges to keep in memory for conversation context (affects in-memory context, not database storage)

max_full_conversations.description: Maximum number of recent conversations to load with full message history. Older conversations will load metadata only for performance.

cuda_device.description: CUDA device to use for GPU acceleration. Options: 'auto' (automatic detection), 'cpu' (CPU only), or specific GPU index like 'cuda:0', 'cuda:1'

allowed_domains.description: List of Home Assistant device domains that are allowed to be controlled

allowed_entities.description: Explicit list of entity IDs that are allowed to be controlled. If empty, all entities in allowed_domains (except exclusions) are permitted.

exclusion_dict.description: Dictionary of entity name patterns to exclude from device discovery

host.description: Ollama server host and port (e.g., '192.168.1.100:11434' or 'localhost:11434'). Will use OLLAMA_IP environment variable if not set.

safety_prompt_enabled.description: Enable or disable the safety instruction prompt that ensures safe and appropriate responses
